articles.title: Bank of America exec's ex-boyfriend accused of beating her to death at California home - NBC News
articles.description: Authorities alleged that Michelle Annette Avan was killed last week at her home by her ex-boyfriend Anthony Duwayne Turner. Avan was an executive at Bank of America.
articles.content:
The son of a bank executive found his mother's body after she was beaten to death by her ex-boyfriend at her home last week, Los Angeles County prosecutors alleged.

articles.title: Cuomo dynasty sputters out as scandal ends in lonely resignation as New York governor - The Straits Times
articles.description: It was an ignominious ending to the once-bright political career of a man nicknamed “America’s governor”.. Read more at straitstimes.com.

articles.title: New York's new Governor Kathy Hochul has strong Irish roots - Independent.ie
articles.description: New York’s new Governor Kathy Hochul is set to make history as the first ever female Governor of New York and the second Irish American to hold the post following the resignation today of Andrew Cuomo following a string of sexual misconduct allegations.

articles.title: Pediatrics group urges FDA OK of COVID-19 vaccines in younger kids - Fox News
articles.description: The American Academy of Pediatrics is urging the FDA to quickly expand authorization of COVID-19 vaccines to younger age groups, citing rising cases due to the fast spreading delta variant and risk of poor outcomes following infection.
